solution.text:
Total distance=300kms
Therefore, half of total distance=\(\frac{300}2\)=150.
Draw a horizontal line from 150 kms on the y-axis towards the right until it intersects the graph.
From this point draw a vertical line downwards until it intersects the x-axis.
